WELCOME TO Pristineadvertising

Performance marketing agency

We are performance marketing agency

Pristina advertising is digital marketing agency that specializes on result oriented advertising at scale. With global reach we have access to the best advertising inventory available so you can be sure your campaigns will be effective from the first day.

  • Transparency

    Our mission is to operate as an extension of your marketing department. We provide you with every piece of data available for us with full transparency how your campaigns being promoted.

  • Global reach

    We know that each client has it's own goals, that said driving results is much more compelling in combination with large scale execution. We aggregate every type of inventory in the world in order to drive the best results at scale on a global level.

  • Efficiency

    Our expertise and technology help us to deliver the right Ad to the right person to achieve KPI's for our customers.

OUR SERVICES

Pristine advertising help clients to get the right customers to their online products while leveraging its experience and technology to optimize a campaign’s life cycle and deliver true return on advertising spend (ROI). Pristine advertising delivers proven results – including increases in purchasing, retention, product usage across all the main verticals retail, utilities, productivity, games, lifestyle, travel, social, finance.

  • Programmatic Buying

    Reach the right audience at the right time.

  • Social Media Buying

    Incredible data segmentation. We find niches for your brand thanks to the possibilities of micro-targeting.

  • Native and Video

    Reach and engage your audience with our Native and Video ad formats. Viewability, Brand Safe and Multiple goals.

  • Display Advertising

    Goal oriented, either Branding or Performance. We deliver the right message to the right targeted audience.
